player.name: Leonidas the Steadfast
player.backstory:
Leonidas, son of Damon, a humble fisherman from the shores of Aegina, never dreamt of inheriting a trading fleet.
   His father, a man of the sea, unexpectedly passed away, leaving Leonidas with three weathered ships, 100 drachmas, and a loyal crew of ten hardened sailors.
   With a heavy heart but a determined spirit, Leonidas embarks on a journey to honor his father's memory and make his mark on the Aegean trade.
   The weight of family responsibility now falls on his shoulders, and a successful business is the only way to provide for his family and ensure their survival 
   in these unpredictable times.
